revised_title: Electrolytic Diffusion of Liquids: A New Method and Observations
tldr: The author presents a new method to study electrolytic diffusion of liquids and observes that liquid diffuses continuously downward through the meniscus during the passage of an upward current. The results show that either no expansion occurs in the bulk of the liquid or that any expansion is compensated for by downward diffusion of an equal volume of liquid.
